taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek chamai, on the ground, and dorea, gift, in reference to small, low-growing palms of great beauty]

bio:treatment.discussion: Chamaedorea species are understory palms in Mexico, Central America, and northern South America. Many species are cultivated in North America both as houseplants and, in warm areas, as garden plants.
Species 77--100 or more (1 in the flora):
